title: Pedophile raped girl, 11, then told her mother: ‘She’s old enough for sex’
text:
Wilfredo Erazo-Turcios was sentenced to life in prison for repeatedly raping an 11-year-old girl (Picture: Manatee County Sheriff’s Office/ Bradenton Police Department)

A pedophile raped an 11 year-old girl, then told his victim’s mother: ‘She’s old enough for sex.’

Wilfredo Erazo-Turcios, 30, was sentenced to life behind bars in Bradenton, Florida last week immediately after he was found guilty of two counts of sexual battery of a child less than 12-years-old.

On New Years Eve 2015, Erazo-Turcios admitted to her mother that he raped the victim 11 time that year. He reportedly lived with the victim and her mother at the time.

He then tried to justify the horrific abuse, telling the girl’s mother that he raped the victim ‘since he felt she was old enough to have sex.’ Erazo-Turcios reportedly knew the girl for five years.

Prosecutor Ed Brodsky said: ‘The victim had known the defendant since she was approximately six years old. The defendant lived in the house with the victim and her family since she was 10 years old.’

Erazo-Turcios fled the country after he realized police would be coming to arrest him (Picture: Bradenton Police Department)

After the victim confirmed to her mother that she had been abused, Erazo-Turcios knew the police were on the way, so he tried to go on the run.

He left in a White Dodge Caravan that was found in Texas the next day, according to the Miami Herald.

He was eventually arrested in September 2017 in Sarasota, Florida. He told police that he first went to Mexico, then his native Honduras.

During the trial, the girl testified and said that Erazo-Turcios threatened to harm her and her family if she ever told anyone about the abuse.

Assistant State Attorney Ashley Disnik issued a statement after the trial, writing: ‘The young victim in this case showed great courage in disclosing the defendant’s action and in confronting her abuser at trial.’

Along with his sentence of life in prison, Erazo-Turcios was also given a lifelong legal designation as a sexual predator.
